args.natural_language_statement: Let G be a group and H a subgroup of finite index n. Prove there exists a normal subgroup K ⊳ G with K ≤ H and |G : K| ≤ n!. Translate to Lean4 and end the statement with := by sorry.

args.natural_language_statement: We have a group G and a subgroup H of finite index n (H.FiniteIndex). Prove there exists K := Subgroup.normalCore H (the core, intersection of conjugates) which is normal and contained in H, and show |G : K| ≤ n!. Translate to Lean4. Use Mathlib imports. End the theorem statement with := by sorry.

history.content: Translate: Prove that if H has finite index n then there is a normal subgroup K of G with K ≤ H and |G: K| ≤ n! Save it to: Dummit-Foote_exercise_4_2_8.lean

import Mathlib
open Subgroup
open Finset Nat

/-- Prove that if H has finite index n then there is a normal subgroup K of G with K ≤ H and |G: K| ≤ n! Save it to: Dummit-Foote_exercise_4_2_8.lean -/
theorem exists_normal_subgroup_le_index_le_factorial_extracted [Group G] (H : Subgroup G) : H.FiniteIndex → ∃ K ≤ H, K.Normal ∧ (G ⧸ K).index ≤ Nat.factorial H.index := sorry

/-- Prove that if H has finite index n then there is a normal subgroup K of G with K ≤ H and |G: K| ≤ n! Save it to: Dummit-Foote_exercise_4_2_8.lean -/
lemma exists_normal_subgroup_le_index_le_factorial_extracted [Group G] (H : Subgroup G) : H.FiniteIndex → ∃ K ≤ H, K.Normal ∧ (G ⧸ K).index ≤ Nat.factorial H.index := sorry"}

import Mathlib
open scoped Classical
open Fintype

/-- Prove that if H has finite index n then there is a normal subgroup K of G with K ≤ H and |G: K| ≤ n! Save it to: Dummit-Foote_exercise_4_2_8.lean -/
lemma exists_normal_subgroup_le_index_le_factorial_extracted {G : Type*} [Group G] (H : Subgroup G) : H.FiniteIndex → ∃ K ≤ H, K.normal ∧ (G ⧸ K).index ≤ Nat.factorial H.index := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open scoped Classical
open Fintype

/-- Prove that if H has finite index n then there is a normal subgroup K of G with K ≤ H and |G: K| ≤ n! Save it to: Dummit-Foote_exercise_4_2_8.lean -/
lemma exists_normal_subgroup_le_index_le_factorial_extracted {G : Type*} [Group G] (H : Subgroup G) : H.FiniteIndex → ∃ K ≤ H, (K ≤ H) ∧ (Subgroup.normalCore H).Index ≤ Nat.factorial H.index := by sorry
